events.message: I just got into a car accident downtown and need to file an insurance claim for the damages caused to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and vehicle details.
An agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claim process and assist with next steps.
We have officially acknowledged your claim and are prioritizing its investigation to resolve it promptly.
Please provide a copy of the police report and photos of your vehicle damage for further processing.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle pictures have been uploaded to the portal.
The investigation team has begun reviewing all submitted materials and interviewing witnesses related to the collision.
The investigation regarding your car accident has been completed. Findings are being prepared for review.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and your policy coverage details.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the settlement offer; we appreciate your cooperation and input.
Your claim has been approved successfully. We are now processing the payment as per the agreed settlement.
The payment for your vehicle repairs has been issued and should reflect in your designated bank account shortly.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed. We hope you are satisfied with the resolution and service.
The complete claim file has been archived in our system for your records and future reference if needed.
